content:
Sure, here are some suggestions and action items for each client and developer mentioned:

Client: C2
Developer: Cyril Lonsido
Suggestion: Offer personalized training and development programs to help Cyril enhance his skills and work with Viktor's unconventional approach.

Action item: Coordinate with Arni to schedule a one-on-one training session with Cyril on how to work with different management styles, including unconventional ones. Also, consider providing him with regular feedback and check-ins to ensure he feels supported and valued.

Client: BlueFrog
Developer: Paul Gravos
Suggestion: Provide opportunities for upskilling and career development.

Action item: Endorse Paul to attend a workshop on back-end tasks, and encourage him to pursue other areas of interest for future project needs. Consider setting up a program for him to work with a mentor on a
